description: Update a project phase dates estimate.
permissions: Authorized via ProjectPhaseDatesEstimatePolicy; access is delegated to the related project phase (same permissions as project phase).
side_effects: Updates attributes or relationships on a project phase dates estimate record.
validation_notes: Project phase dates estimate id argument is required. At least one field must be specified for update. If provided, start-date, end-date, and created-by cannot be empty. Start date and end date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format. End date must be on or after start date. If created-by is provided, the referenced user must be permitted to update the record.
